segments.text: well , I ’ m very good with people . I ’ m honorable . I work hard . I work well under pressure . And I ’ m patient .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what kind of people do you like to work with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like a person who works hard . I don ’ t like lazy people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , this is a challenging question . I suppose I would say that I ’ m a quick learner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think so . I think that I am good at what I do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what do you consider your weakness ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m not good at speaking in public . I feel uncomfortable when I speak in public .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that ’ s not a problem . It ’ s unnecessary for this position .
segments.speaker: S1
